sentences.english: Let's go to East Tomb Park by taxi.

sentences.english: There are Qing Dynasty imperial tombs at Zunhua (East Qing Tombs) and Yixian (West Qing Tombs).

sentences.english: There will be at least one example in the box that contains black aventurine.
sentences.chinese: 將會有至少有一個例子黑色的方塊，其中包含東陵。

sentences.english: Yu is also a calendar in May Tanglin's birthday lucky stone.
sentences.chinese: 東陵玉也是公曆五月份的生辰幸運石。
